https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Apnw8FWoPOIsu14d5dvaNZzFSJE.jpg A Saiyan Space pod crash-lands on Earth out of which a wounded Saiyan crawls: Broly, the Legendary Super Saiyan. The wounded Broly shouts out in frustration and turns into normal form. The place soon freezes, trapping him in it and he falls into a coma. Dragon Ball Z: Broly – Second Coming
